summary: 该插件用于检测ColdFusion应用中是否存在CVE-2010-2861文件包含漏洞，通过发送特定payload并验证响应内容来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the CVE-2010-2861 file inclusion vulnerability in ColdFusion applications by sending a specific payload and verifying the response content to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
